name: Story Book
title: Dive into an enchanting collection of short stories that blend adventure, imagination, and timeless morals—perfect for readers who love to explore magical worlds and rich storytelling.

name: Entertainment Book
title: A lively collection of stories and features packed with humor, suspense, and cinematic moments. Ideal for readers looking to relax and unwind.

name: Food Book
title: Discover mouthwatering recipes, cooking tips, and food stories from across the globe. Perfect for food lovers and aspiring chefs alike.

name: Motivational Book
title: A powerful guide filled with real-life stories, mindset shifts, and strategies to overcome obstacles. Ideal for anyone seeking clarity, strength, and personal growth.

name: Sport Book
title: Explore iconic sports moments, inspiring athletes, and winning techniques. A must-read for sports lovers and future champions.

name: Health & Wellness
title: Unlock the secrets to a balanced life with tips on nutrition, mental health, fitness, and self-care. Your companion for inner peace and daily energy.

name: Novel Book
title: Immerse yourself in a gripping story where emotions run deep and every chapter reveals a new twist. Perfect for fans of heart-touching fiction and suspense.

name: Science Book
title: Dive into the fascinating world of science with easy explanations and real-life applications. Ideal for curious minds and future innovators.

name: Tech Book
title: Explore emerging technologies, artificial intelligence, and the future of connectivity. A must-read for tech enthusiasts and forward thinkers.

name: Artificial Intelligence Book
title: Learn how AI is reshaping our world—from smart assistants to self-driving cars. A beginner-friendly guide with deep insights into the AI revolution.

name: English Book
title: Improve your fluency, grammar, and writing with easy-to-follow lessons. Perfect for learners at all levels aiming to communicate effectively.

name: Drama Book
title: Experience powerful narratives that explore human emotions and relationships through gripping drama. Perfect for lovers of intense storytelling.

name: Travel Book
title: Discover captivating travel stories, tips, and guides to inspire your next adventure. Perfect for explorers and dreamers alike.

name: Children’s Books
title: Engaging stories full of imagination and learning, designed to inspire young minds and nurture a love for reading.

name: Love Book
title: Explore touching stories that celebrate the power of love and human connection, perfect for hopeless romantics.

name: Mystery Book
title: Dive into suspenseful tales full of twists, secrets, and edge-of-your-seat thrills that keep you guessing until the last page.

name: Power of Subconscious Mind
title: This book is designed to teach you that your habitual thinking and imagery mold, fashion, and create your destiny; for as a man thinketh in his sub-conscious mind

name: Psychology of Money
title: The Psychology of Money is an insightful and thought-provoking book that offers a fresh perspective on a subject that affects us all

name: Rich Dad Poor Dad
title: The book encourages readers to develop financial independence through investing, business ownership, and smart money management, rather than relying only on traditional jobs.
